response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your business. Considering its intrinsic worth and the impact it could have on your company, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,200,000, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to discussing the details and how this product can contribute to your business success. Should you require any further information or have questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 1100000}
